News.headline: Match Officials: Maidstone United vs Dagenham and Redbridge
News.page_title: Match Officials: Maidstone United vs Dagenham and Redbridge
News.URL_keywords: Match Officials: Maidstone United vs Dagenham and Redbridge
News.short_description: Tuesday's referee for the Daggers' Vanarama National league away game against Maidstone United has been named as Constantine Hatzidakis.
News.description:
The two assistants have been named as Bhupinder Gill and Gary Parsons with the fourth official being Damith Bandara.

Ticket information for the game can be foundÂ here.
